Name: Fire & Chemical Boots

Name: ULTI-CHEM Plus Chemical Glove
Description: ULTI-CHEM Plus Rubber Chemical Gloves. Premium hand protection against chemicals, mechanical, contact heat & micro-organism hazards.

Name: Iron Man Gloves
Description: Dromex Iron Man Aluminium Gloves are designed with a Kevlar lining, Kevlar palm & aluminium backing to provide protection against contact heat to 500°C

Name: Poly Viscose Acid Conti Suit Reflective
Description: Dromex Reflective Chemical Conti Suit. Heavy duty, durable work garment designed to protect against acid splashes & mechanical hazards. Acid Conti Suit.

Name: 21 cal Arc Denim Pants
Description: Dromex 21 cal Arc Denim Pants. Arc rated workwear that provides the highest level of safety in the case of an electrical arc flash. ATPV 21 cal/cm2.

Name: Inferno Gloves
Description: Dromex Inferno Fire Fighter Gloves. Multi-layered tan leather with Kevlar reinforcing. High heat resistance, breathable, comfortable & heavy duty.

Name: 51 Cal Leather Arc Gloves
Description: Dromex 51 cal Leather Arc Flash Gloves provide your hands the highest level of protection against the hazards of an Arc Flash. Cut level 5 protection.

Name: 9.6 cal Arc Shirt
Description: Dromex 9.6 cal Arc Shirt provides the user added protection in the case of an Electrical Arc Flash. Flame retardant reflective tape for added visibility.

Name: 15 cal Arc Suit
Description: Dromex 15 cal Arc Suit Navy Blue - for ultimate safety in the case of an Arc Flash. Our ARC workwear range is designed & tested by world-leading experts.

Name: Bump Cap
Description: Dromex Bump Cap provides protection against lacerations, abrasions, minor bumps & other injuries in the workplace. Available in black or navy blue.

Name: Bushmaster With Clear Visor
Description: Dromex Bushmaster includes high protection factor ear muffs & a high performance clear polycarbonate visor. Adjustable for maximum comfort & protection.

Name: Junior Ear Muffs
Description: Dromex Banded Junior Ear Muffs with adjustable, rotating ear cups. Comfortable, lightweight & re-usable. SNR 25 dB.

Name: InterEx Ear Muffs

Name: Banded Re-Usable Earplugs

Name: Blue Corded Re-Usable Earplugs

Name: Corded Disposable Foam Earplugs

Name: Ear Plug Dispenser
Description: Dromex Ear Plug Dispenser can be mounted on a wall or placed on any surface for easy access to hearing protection. Compatible with DRO30 ear plugs.

Name: Classic Extreme Ear Muffs

Name: Cut5 Apron

Name: Crinkle Rubber Gloves

Name: Cut5 Dipped Glove

Description: Dromex ACE ONE Cow Leather Apron 60cm x 90cm. 1-Piece apron made from natural cow hide split grain leather. Suitable for use when welding.

Name: A2 Twin Unifit Filter

Name: P2PF Single Unifit Pre-Filters
Description: Dromex P2PF Single Unifit Pre-Filters used in conjunction with Dromex gas cartridges that fit on Dromex Single Half Mask (DH101). Set of 6.

Description: Dromex P2 Single Unifit Filter for medium concentrations of solid dust & liquid aerosol hazardous which cannot be filtered by chemical only cartridges.
